name: Rush Duel! (Rule Card)
text:
RULES:
? Starting hand is 4 cards.
? First turn draws 1 card.
? You must refill your hand to 5 during your Draw Phase. Draw 1 card instead if you already had 5 cards in hand before the Draw Phase.
? No Hand size limit.
? Only 3 columns on field. Pendulum Scales go in the leftmost and rightmost Spell/Trap Zone.
? Unlimited Normal Summons/Sets.
? No Standby Phase or Main Phase 2. You cannot use cards that need these Phases.
